definitions.definition: The male ruler of a barony .
A male member of the lowest rank of English nobility (the equivalent rank in Scotland is lord ).
A person of great power in society, especially in business and politics.
A prisoner who gains power and influence by lending or selling goods such as tobacco .
A baron of beef , a cut made up of a double sirloin .
Any of various nymphalid butterflies of the genus Euthalia .

main_definition: The male ruler of a barony .
secondary_definitions: A male member of the lowest rank of English nobility (the equivalent rank in Scotland is lord ).
( by extension ) A person of great power in society, especially in business and politics.
( UK , prison slang ) A prisoner who gains power and influence by lending or selling goods such as tobacco .
A baron of beef , a cut made up of a double sirloin .
Any of various nymphalid butterflies of the genus Euthalia .
